summary: Consume SecurityScorecard API to retrieve company security information and scores.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to retrieve data for (e.g., company, industry, report).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., get factor scores, get historical scores).

parameters.name: scorecard identifier
parameters.description: Primary identifier of a company or scorecard, such as domain.

parameters.name: score
parameters.description: Specify the target score for a company's score improvement plan.

parameters.name: return all
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: simplify
parameters.description: Specify whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data.
